search_results.title: Jon Day
search_results.snippet: Jon Day was born in London in 1984. He studied English at St John's College, Oxford, and now teaches at King's College, London.

search_results.snippet: Jon Day is a writer, critic, cyclist, and fisherman. He teaches English at King's College London, and has written essays and reviews for the London Review ...
